name: reflection-instrumenter
description: A tool providing reflection API to your source code
author: Yannick Galatol <yannick.galatol@gmail.com>

scripts.bump: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --tags origin master
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --tags origin master
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --tags origin master
